title: CELESTE LARIAT NECKLACE, SILVER
description: The Celeste Lariat features a 2-inch hanging strand of trillion, oval, and marquise lab-grown white sapphires. The 18 inch necklace features two loops that adjust to 16 and 17 inches.
details:
Metal: Sterling silver
Setting: Prong-set
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Trillion, oval, and marquise-cut
Chain Length: 18 inches with adjustable loops to 16 and 17 inches.

0.85 CTW DEW

What is Lab-Grown?
